rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Are you a new patient with us, or have you visited before?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Status
rules.condition: Patient confirms their new or established status.
rules.example: Okay, thank you for confirming you're an established patient.

rules.title: Request Identifying Information (Established)
rules.action: Request specific identifying information (e.g., phone number, DOB) to locate their chart.
rules.example: To find your chart, could I please get your phone number or date of birth?

rules.title: Acknowledge Information Receipt
rules.action: Verbally acknowledge receipt of the information.

rules.title: Inform of Chart Lookup
rules.condition: Agent is about to access patient information.
rules.action: Inform the patient about the information lookup and a potential brief wait.
rules.example: Please hold for a moment while I pull up your records.

rules.title: Confirm Purpose & Reason for Visit
rules.condition: Patient information has been successfully retrieved.
rules.action: Confirm the call's purpose and inquire about the specific type or reason for the appointment.
rules.example: Now that I have your chart, you're looking to book an appointment, correct? What's the reason for your visit today?

rules.title: Offer Available Appointment Times
rules.condition: The reason for the appointment is clear.
rules.action: Present the patient with available appointment slots.
rules.example: For that, we have an opening next Monday at 9 AM or Wednesday at 1 PM. Do either of those work?

rules.title: Suggest Alternative Times
rules.condition: Initial appointment offer is not suitable for the patient.
rules.example: No problem at all. How about later next week, perhaps Thursday at 10 AM, or Friday in the afternoon?
